text: Yes, experiencing severe bloating during the second trimester, especially around 17 weeks, can be quite normal. If itâ€™s just visible bloating and discomfort by the end of the day, itâ€™s likely nothing to worry about. You can try eating smaller meals, avoiding gassy foods, drinking more water, and doing some light walking after meals to help ease it.
